about_the_game:
Embark on an unforgettable adventure in the hidden object search game "Royal Romances: Battle of the Woods"! Additional locations await you in each of the four games of the series! Try to find all the hidden objects and learn new details about the story! Discover a new world filled with mystery, magical creatures, and romantic tales. Step into the shoes of different characters, learn amazing details about their unique stories, meet new friends, and make your own choices that affect the game's plot!

The romantic story continues with the additional content "Royal Affair: Battle for the Woods DLC", full of new unforgettable adventures! In the new locations, you can learn new details about the characters and unlock all the secrets of the forest. Unlock new achievements after completing all quests!

🎈 HEAD TO THE CENTAUR VILLAGE!
Help rebuild the centaur elders building!

🎈 EXPLORE THE MEMORIES!
Discover the secrets of the past that the memory bowl holds!

🎈 RETRIEVE THE MAGIC FEATHER!
Solve Serena's riddle and be rewarded with a feather that holds great magical power!

🎈 WHAT IS THE NATURE OF THE CURSE?
Get the information about the Ichon's curse! Are you ready to take up the challenge?

Challenge yourself and achieve your goals to unlock all the achievements!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Explore additional locations and find all the hidden items! Make your own choices and see where they lead!
